topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c9d4d163687243767f0700#post_54c9d4d163687243767f0700
Red X. Originally it was another identity Robin assumed in order to get closer to Slade, but that plan fell through. He stored the Red X gear away, but then it was stolen. The thief's identity, and intentions, were never revealed.
topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c9d4d163687243767f0700#post_54c9d4d163687243767f0700
Okay, during Robin's brief stint of villainy, he ditched hos old costume and gear and adopted the persona of Red X. And after like two seasons someone STOLE the Red X gear. After the episode he showed up like twice and was never truly explained of expanded upon. We never learned who he was or what his story was. It's a classic case of wasted potential.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
